attributes.action: Introduce Road Renting for all vehicles travelling more than 50 miles from their registered home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In other words if you use the roads then you pay. There would be varying schemes for different categories of cars and heavy goods. With satellite technology it would be very easy to track vehicles. Relief would be given for those handicapped and the like and for emergency use. Similarly, the same technology could be used to enforce speed violators. 50 Miles is arbitrary and the actual distance is open to negotiation.
